Risk Description: Electronic monitoring or life support equipment may malfunction or fail when exposed to strong MRI magnetic fields potentially causing patient harm or loss of critical monitoring data
Risk Mitigation: Use only MRI-compatible electronic devices within 5-gauss line and maintain backup monitoring systems outside MRI suite

Risk Description: Radiofrequency energy from MRI scanner can cause heating of electronic circuits and metallic components in devices leading to burns or device failure
Risk Mitigation: Conduct thermal testing of all electronic equipment and establish maximum exposure time limits with temperature monitoring protocols
